attributes.action: CAMPAIGN FOR A PROTON THERAPY UNIT IN THE UK TO TREAT CHILDHOOD AND ADULT CANCERS
attributes.additional_details:
CAMPAIGN FOR A PROTON THERAPY UNIT IN THE UK TO TREAT CHILDHOOD AND ADULT CANCERS



Create a flagship unit or facility to offer this treatment which is currently only available in USA or china

Cases like asha king should be a warning! Why can the uk government not provide treatment?

We need to be offering our cancer sufferers all available treatment options.

Yes it is expensive  but one flagship facility offering specialist treatment is surely worth the tax payers pound

rejection.details: Please seethe terms and conditions of creating an e-petition.  Petitions are not accepted without the name of the person creating the petition as well as the email address.  Please resubmit this giving your name.
